title: Astronaut Terry Virts Life Advice Will Leave You SPEECHLESS
itunes:title: Astronaut Terry Virts Life Advice Will Leave You SPEECHLESS
itunes:subtitle: Motiversity
description:
Col. Terry Virts, NASA Astronaut and Commander of the International Space Station, gives one of the most eye opening interviews you will ever hear.

Inspired? Get Virts books: View From Above: Astronaut Photographs the World: https://amzn.to/39FuJzT

How to Astronaut: An Insider's Guide to Leaving Planet Earth: https://amzn.to/37wNDZe


Special thanks to Brian Rose and London Real for partnering with us!


Speaker:


Terry Virts


Music:


Epidemic Sound


Disclaimer: Some of the links above are affiliate links. If you use our link to make a purchase, we make a small commission. Thank you for your continued support!
